name: Space Rocks (itch) (melodyver)
description:
Space Rocks is obviously based on the Space Rocks Tutorial for GameMaker. This game is the first alpha test for a game in my mind since 2016 and works as a first prove of concept. There is still much work to do but allready this version brings quite some joy to players, so here please find the actual version of the shooter!

Hunt for your local highscore and survive in space as long as you can stand!
